about_the_game:
Every fantasy world needs caves! This tileset collection has three different underground biomes each with unique floor and wall textures: root caves, mossy caverns, and stone dungeons. On top of those you can mix-and-match themes with tiles for natural vines and foliage, prison jail cells, or of course: mines!
With carts, tracks, and ores in multiple colors, your hero can dig up resources from the depths. This set also includes a variety of switches and levers so you can create interactive puzzles-- but watch out for traps!

And all of it is designed to work with the TIME ELEMENTS character sprites, so you can bring your game to life! The world of TIME ELEMENTS goes underground!

Features:

* Three different underground biome themes!
* Natural root caves with vines and mushrooms
* Mossy or stone caverns with prison jail dungeon
* Mines: carts, tracks, ores, and mining effect animations
* Animated objects: switches, levers, traps, and others

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
